CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Specifies which approver will receive timesheet reminder notifications for this assignment.
Notify Primary Approver – Sends the reminder email to the Primary Approver. Notify Alternative Approver – Sends the reminder email to the Alternative Approver. Notify Primary and Alternative Approver – Sends the reminder email to both the Primary and Alternative Approvers. Blank – No reminder will be sent for this assignment.
CustomField.label: Send Timesheet Reminders To
